Package Grupo11_ISCTE.Code_Smells_Detective

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
Grupo11_ISCTE.Code_Smells_Detective.Rule
public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the rules for the Defects Detection. This rules will be used according with what will be the input in the GUI.

  • Constructor Details

    • Rule

      public Rule​(boolean isAndOperator, java.lang.String metric, float threshold, boolean isAbove)
      Class Constructor. Creates a Rule with the specified variables.
      Parameters:
      isAndOperator - Answer to the question "Is AND operator?".
      metric - The metric name.
      threshold - The threshold value.
      isAbove - Answer to the question "Is above?".

  • Method Details

    • getIsAndOperator

      public boolean getIsAndOperator()
      This method get logical operator that should be used in the rule. It returns true if the logical operator AND should be used. It returns false if the logical operator OR should be used.
      Returns:
      a boolean.

    • getMetric

      public java.lang.String getMetric()
      This method get the metrics name.
      Returns:
      a String.

    • getThreshold

      public float getThreshold()
      This method get the threshold value.
      Returns:
      a float.

    • isAbove

      public boolean isAbove()
      This method get signal operator that should be used in the rule. It returns true if the signal operator 'greater than' should be used. It returns false if the signal operator 'less than or equal to' should be used.
      Returns:
      a boolean.
